autumn.util.data.json

Interface JsonNumber

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JsonValue, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConcreteJsonNumber

    public interface JsonNumber
extends JsonValue
    An instance of this class represents a number in the JSON format.
